rate: Structured as an ad valorem tax applied on fixed tax base amounts - precios fictos - per volume varying by beverage category, effectively operating as a specific (volume-based) tax.  The fixed tax base amounts—“precios fictos”—are usually adjusted annually; however, it is not mandated by law. Precios fictos adjusted in Dec 2021 (Decreto 443/021) for 2022 year at (per litre): $20.79 for mineral waters and sodas, 32.73 for fresh or reconstituted juices or nectars with minimum 50% fruit juice content, $35.95 for other juice-based drinks, $32.73 for liquid meal replacements, $$57.41 for malts, $35.95 for energy drinks, $7.74 for solid concentrates, $80.33 for non-alcoholic beers. Ad valorem rates currently set at: 8% on mineral waters and sodas, 12% on fresh or reconstituted juices or nectars with minimum 50% fruit juice content, 18% on other juice-based drinks, 12% on energy drinks and liquid meal replacements, 14% on malts, 18% on solid concentrates. Imports are calculated as the fixed value for domestic products multiplied by two, which means that imported products are subject to higher charges.
